verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6485>visited<s%> <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> as he had <S%H559>said,<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> to <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> as he had <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>

<S%H8283>Sarah<s%> <S%H2029>conceived,<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> in his old <S%H2208>age,<s%> at the set <S%H4150>time<s%> of which <S%H430>God<s%> had spoken to <S%H1696>him.<s%>
<S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H8034>his<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> who was <S%H3205>born<s%> to <S%H8283>him,<s%> whom Sarah <S%H3205>bore<s%> to <S%H3327>him,<s%> Isaac.

<S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> when he was <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> as <S%H430>God<s%> had commanded <S%H6680>him.<s%>
<S%H85>Abraham<s%> was one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> was born to <S%H3205>him.<s%>
<S%H8283>Sarah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H430>"God<s%> has <S%H6213>made<s%> me <S%H6712>laugh.<s%> Everyone who <S%H8085>hears<s%> will laugh with <S%H6711>me.<s%>"

She <S%H4448>said,<s%> "Who would have <S%H4448>said<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> that <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> would <S%H3243>nurse<s%> <S%H1121>children?<s%> For I have <S%H3205>borne<s%> him a <S%H1121>son<s%> in his old <S%H2208>age.<s%>"

The <S%H3206>child<s%> <S%H1431>grew,<s%> and was <S%H1580>weaned.<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4960>feast<s%> on the <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> was <S%H1580>weaned.<s%>
<S%H8283>Sarah<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1904>Hagar<s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptian,<s%> whom she had <S%H3205>borne<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H6711>mocking.<s%>

Therefore she <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> "Cast <S%H1644>out<s%> this <S%H519>handmaid<s%> and her <S%H1121>son!<s%> For the <S%H1121>son<s%> of this <S%H519>handmaid<s%> will not be <S%H3423>heir<s%> with my <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac.<s%>"
The <S%H1697>thing<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3415>grievous<s%> in <S%H85>Abraham<s%>'s <S%H5869>sight<s%> on <S%H182>account<s%> of his <S%H1121>son.<s%>

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H3415>"Don't<s%> let it be grievous in your <S%H5869>sight<s%> because of the <S%H5288>boy,<s%> and because of your <S%H519>handmaid.<s%> In all that <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> to <S%H8085>you,<s%> listen to her <S%H6963>voice.<s%> For from <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> will your <S%H2233>seed<s%> be <S%H7121>called.<s%>
I will also <S%H7760>make<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%> of the <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H519>handmaid,<s%> because he is your <S%H2233>seed.<s%>"

<S%H85>Abraham<s%> rose up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> and a <S%H2573>bottle<s%> of <S%H4325>water,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> it to <S%H1904>Hagar,<s%> <S%H7760>putting<s%> it on her <S%H7926>shoulder;<s%> and gave her the <S%H3206>child,<s%> and sent her <S%H7971>away.<s%> She <S%H3212>departed,<s%> and <S%H8582>wandered<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H884>Beersheba.<s%>
The <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H4480>in<s%> the <S%H2573>bottle<s%> was <S%H3615>spent,<s%> and she <S%H7993>cast<s%> the <S%H3206>child<s%> under <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H7880>shrubs.<s%>

She <S%H3212>went<s%> and sat <S%H3427>down<s%> <S%H5048>opposite<s%> <S%H7368>him,<s%> a good way off, about a bow <S%H2909>shot<s%> <S%H559>away.<s%> For she said, <S%H7200>"Don't<s%> let me see the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H3206>child.<s%>" She <S%H3427>sat<s%> over against <S%H5375>him,<s%> and lifted up her <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H1058>wept.<s%>

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H5288>boy.<s%> The <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to <S%H1904>Hagar<s%> out of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1904>her,<s%> "What ails you, Hagar? <S%H1904>Don't<s%> be afraid. For <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the boy where he <S%H5288>is.<s%>
Get <S%H5375>up,<s%> lift <S%H5375>up<s%> the <S%H5288>boy,<s%> and <S%H2388>hold<s%> him in your <S%H3027>hand.<s%> For I will <S%H7760>make<s%> him a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nation.<s%>"

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6491>opened<s%> her <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and she <S%H7200>saw<s%> a <S%H875>well<s%> of <S%H4325>water.<s%> She <S%H3212>went,<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H2573>bottle<s%> with <S%H4325>water,<s%> and <S%H8248>gave<s%> the <S%H5288>boy<s%> <S%H8248>drink.<s%>
<S%H430>God<s%> was with the <S%H5288>boy,<s%> and he <S%H1431>grew.<s%> He <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H7235>became,<s%> as he grew up, an archer.
He <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6290>Paran.<s%> His <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> for him out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

It happened at that <S%H6256>time,<s%> that <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> and <S%H6369>Phicol<s%> the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of his <S%H6635>army<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H430>"God<s%> is with you in all that you <S%H6213>do.<s%>

<S%H7650>Now,<s%> therefore, swear to me <S%H2008>here<s%> by <S%H430>God<s%> that you will not deal <S%H8266>falsely<s%> with <S%H5209>me,<s%> nor with my son, nor with my <S%H5220>son<s%>'s son. But according to the <S%H2617>kindness<s%> that I have <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H6213>you,<s%> you shall do to <S%H776>me,<s%> and to the land in which you have lived as a <S%H1481>foreigner.<s%>"
<S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will <S%H7650>swear.<s%>"

<S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H3198>complained<s%> to <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H182>because<s%> of a <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H875>well,<s%> which <S%H40>Abimelech<s%>'s <S%H5650>servants<s%> had violently taken <S%H1497>away.<s%>

<S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "I <S%H3045>don't<s%> know who has <S%H6213>done<s%> this <S%H1697>thing.<s%> You <S%H3808>didn't<s%> <S%H5046>tell<s%> <S%H3808>me,<s%> neither did I <S%H8085>hear<s%> of <S%H1115>it,<s%> until <S%H3117>today.<s%>"
<S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%> and <S%H1241>cattle,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them to <S%H40>Abimelech.<s%> <S%H8147>Those<s%> two <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>
<S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H5324>set<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> ewe <S%H3535>lambs<s%> of the flock by <S%H6629>themselves.<s%>
<S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H2008>"What<s%> do these <S%H7651>seven<s%> ewe <S%H3535>lambs<s%> which you have set by themselves <S%H5324>mean?<s%>"

He <S%H559>said,<s%> "You shall <S%H3947>take<s%> these <S%H7651>seven<s%> ewe <S%H3535>lambs<s%> from my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> <S%H5668>that<s%> it may be a <S%H5713>witness<s%> to <S%H2658>me,<s%> that I have dug this <S%H875>well.<s%>"
Therefore he <S%H7121>called<s%> that <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H884>Beersheba,<s%> because <S%H8147>they<s%> both swore <S%H7650>there.<s%>

So they <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> at <S%H884>Beersheba.<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> with <S%H6369>Phicol,<s%> the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of his <S%H6635>army,<s%> and they <S%H7725>returned<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>

Abraham <S%H5193>planted<s%> a tamarisk <S%H815>tree<s%> in <S%H884>Beersheba,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> there on the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H5769>Everlasting<s%> <S%H410>God.<s%>
<S%H85>Abraham<s%> lived as a <S%H1481>foreigner<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>
